# we-navigation-drawer



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                             | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `closed` | `closed`  | If true the navigation drawer is closed | `boolean` | `true`  |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                | Description                                                          |
| ------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--align-items`     | Align items of navigation drawer <br> Default: start                 |
| `--background`      | Background of navigation drawer <br> Default: rgba(151, 151, 151, 1) |
| `--border`          | Border of navigation drawer <br> Default: none                       |
| `--bottom`          | Bottom option of navigation drawer <br> Default: auto                |
| `--color`           | Color of navigation drawer <br> Default: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)            |
| `--display`         | Display of navigation drawer <br> Default: flex                      |
| `--font-size`       | Font size of navigation drawer <br> Default: 1em                     |
| `--height`          | Height of navigation drawer <br> Default: 100vh                      |
| `--justify-content` | Justify content of navigation drawer <br> Default: left              |
| `--left`            | Left option of navigation drawer <br> Default: 0                     |
| `--padding`         | Padding of navigation drawer <br> Default: 0.625em                   |
| `--position`        | Position of navigation drawer <br> Default: fixed                    |
| `--right`           | Right option of navigation drawer <br> Default: auto                 |
| `--top`             | Top option of navigation drawer <br> Default: 0                      |
| `--transition`      | Transition of navigation drawer <br> Default: all 0.5s               |
| `--width`           | Width of navigation drawer<br> Default: 12.5em                       |
